for blockhashes"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"calculateBlockheaders(bytes[],bytes32)":{"notice":"starts with a given blockhash and its header and tries to recreate a (reverse) chain of blocks the array of the blockheaders have to be in reverse order (e.g. [100,99,98,97]) if the provided chain is not correct (parentHash != calculated hash) if the hash is correct it will return the blockhash of the last header"},"constructor":"constructor, calls snapshot-function when contract get deployed as entry point","getParentAndBlockhash(bytes)":{"notice":"returns the blockhash and the parent blockhash from the provided blockheader"},"recreateBlockheaders(uint256,bytes[])":{"notice":"starts with a given blocknumber and its header and tries to recreate a (reverse) chain of blocks  only usable when the given blocknumber is already in the smart contract it will be checked whether the provided chain is correct by using the calculateBlockheaders function if successfull the last blockhash of the header will be added to the smart contract"},"saveBlockNumber(uint256)":{"notice":"stores a certain blockhash to the state will fail if the block can't be found inside the evm"},"searchForAvailableBlock(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"returns the closest snapshot if found within the given range returns 0 if no snapshot has been found in that rnage"},"snapshot()":{"notice":"stores the currentBlock-1 in the smart he will also get the deposit paid by the caller."},"confirmUnregisteringServer(uint256)":{"notice":"this function must be called by the caller of the requestUnregisteringServer-function after 28 days if the owner did not cancel, the caller will receive 20% of the server deposit + his own deposit. the owner will receive 80% of the server deposit before the server will be removed."},"convict(uint256,bytes32)":{"notice":"commits a blocknumber and a hash"},"registerServer(string,uint256,uint64)":{"notice":"register a new Server with the sender as owner    "},"requestUnregisteringServer(uint256)":{"notice":"this should be called before unregistering a server. there are 2 use cases: a) the owner wants to stop offering the service and remove the server.    in this case he has to wait for one hour before actually removing the server.     This is needed in order to give others a chance to convict it in case this server signs wrong hashes b) anybody can request to remove a server because it has been inactive.    in this case he needs to pay a small deposit, which he will lose "},"totalServers()":{"notice":"length of the serverlist"},"updateServer(uint256,uint256,uint64)":{"notice":"updates a Server by adding the msg.value to the deposit and setting the props    "}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/contracts/ServerRegistry.sol":"ServerRegistry"},"evmVersion":"petersburg","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/contracts/BlockhashRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0be886f79a2de66829ba4fe035b47f99e11116b4736da7dca1cd3ce2201210eb","urls":["bzzr://88bab486dc879e2d938f9c18c5a96572620c8c7efbdd633d92541359479c59be"]},"/contracts/ServerRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1fb513c9f9ed64d04e94736336bbee7479c1c72c6a79211e21a2138bbd88540e","urls":["bzzr://0035c646462b3738766153bd7c2ad37daf33871c10c3f0e95795d5bcdadd7e07"]}},"version":1}
